message:
SYSTEM: LPS_BIGGER-09.03.2017.pdf: Página 23
Pure emotion hypothesis
• What makes the difference on fine-grained sentiment
analysis?
• Where is the line between satisfaction and love?
• Where can we find discriminative leads?
• Let’s take for training just “pure” emotions (this is, 
documents just tagged as one emotion). There must
be something relevant…
• So one of our classifiers follows this idea. On its own
is obviously not good, but is useful in cascade!
23
speaker: SYSTEM
